ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: <color=#d2911e>领主大人</color>，请告诉我<color=#d2911e>你的名字</color>

对战信用规则：
1、领主大人的初始分数都是满分<color=#d2911e>100分</color>

2、您的<color=#d2911e>违规行为</color>会扣除一定的对战信用积分，请注意：
游戏对战中，<color=#d2911e>挂机</color>（包括人机），则扣除<color=#d2911e>2~5分</color>;
游戏对战中，如果被其他<color=#d2911e>玩家举报</color>，并且系统判定有效则扣除<color=#d2911e>3分</color>;
游戏对战中，若被其他<color=#d2911e>多名玩家举报</color>，并且系统判定有效，则额外扣除<color=#d2911e>5分</color>;
匹配成功时，不点击确定按钮，每次扣除<color=#d2911e>1分</color>。

3、您在对战中<color=#d2911e>表现良好</color>，可恢复对战信用积分，请努力：
<color=#d2911e>正常完成一局对战</color>，无论输赢每局增加1分;
完成<color=#d2911e>人机对战</color>，无论输赢每局增加<color=#d2911e>1分</color>。
如果对战过程中出现违规行为，就会受到扣分惩罚！

4、如果<color=#d2911e>对战信用累计扣分</color>达到规定上限即会<color=#d2911e>立即</color>受到禁止参与匹配和排位惩罚（在一周内处罚时间依次递增），每日完成一局，且当日无扣积分，则槽内分数-2。

5、若对战信用积分低于<color=#d2911e>90分</color>，将<color=#d2911e>禁止参加排位赛</color>！

6、若对战信用积分低于<color=#d2911e>60分</color>，将<color=#d2911e>禁止参加匹配赛</color>！

7、对战信用积分会让你获得<color=#d2911e>信誉评级</color>，不同分数对应不同的评级！
100分为<color=#d2911e>优</color> 3星
60~99分为<color=#d2911e>良</color> 2星
0~59分为<color=#d2911e>差</color> 1星

希望各位领主大人继续努力，唯有你们的正义和勇敢才能捍卫战争怒吼的荣耀！
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN:
Battle Rep Rules: 
1. Each player starts with <color=#d2911e>100 points.</color>

2. <color=#d2911e>Violation of the rules</color> will result in reduction of the following points:
In battle, <color=#d2911e>idling</color>(Including vs A.I.）, will result in a reduction of <color=#d2911e>2 to 5 points. </color>;
In battle, if <color=#d2911e>reported by another player</color>, and the system determines it is a valid report, it will result in a reduction of <color=#d2911e>3 points.</color>;
In battle, if <color=#d2911e>multiple players send a report</color>, and the system determines they are valid reports, it will result in a reduction of <color=#d2911e>5 points. </color>;
When the match is complete, each time the OK button is not clicked, will result in a reduction of <color=#d2911e>1 point</color>. 

3. If you <color=#d2911e>behave well</color> in game you can restore Rep the following ways:
<color=#d2911e>Complete a game without incident</color>, regardless of win or lose can increase Rep by 1 point. 
 <color=#d2911e>Completing an A.I. match without incident</color>, regardless of win or loss can increase rep by <color=#d2911e>1 point</color>. 
 Keep in mind if you break there rules you will be penalized! 

4. If <color=#d2911e>Rep reaches its minimum</color> below the player will be <color=#d2911e>immediately suspended</color> from normal matchmaking or ranked matches(within one week the Rep will gradually increase). By completing a match a day and not doing anything to lose Rep, your Rep should increase by 2 points. 

5. If your Rep goes below <color=#d2911e>90</color>, you will be <color=#d2911e>suspended from Ranked matches</color>. 

5. If your Rep goes below <color=#d2911e>60</color>, you will be <color=#d2911e>suspended from matchmaking</color>. 

7. With your Rep points you will also receive a <color=#d2911e>Rep rating</color>, better scores get better ratings! 
100 Points - <color=#d2911e>Excellent</color> -3 Stars
60 to 99 Points - <color=#d2911e>Good</color> - 2 Stars
0 to 59 Points - <color=#d2911e>Bad </color> - 1 Star

We hope all will work hard to keep the game clean and fun for all. Good luck to you and all your battles!

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN:
每周各个对战模式中累计获得的金币上限为<color=#d2911e>3500</color>
除对战模式外，其他途径（如任务）产出的金币不进入此限制。
保持良好的<color=#d2911e>对战信用</color>将会获得更多的金币:
每天5:00，系统会检查玩家的对战信用状态:
如果对战信用=100，则本周的金币上限+100；
如果对战信用<60，则本周的金币上限-200。
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN:
The total amount of Hero Coins that can be gained from battles each week is <color=#d2911e>3500</color>
 Aside from in battles, Hero Coins gained from other ways(i.e. Tasks) do not count towards this limit. 
 Keep a good<color=#d2911e> Battle Rep Rating</color> and you will get more Hero Coins.
 Every day at 5:00 the system will check Battle Rep: 
 If Battle Rep is 100, the the coin limit will have a +100 increase. 
 If Battle Rep is less than 60 then it will be decreased by 200.
Playing in battles can get you Hero Coins

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN:
1、排位联赛：每届排位联赛的<color=#d2911e>持续时间大概为三个月</color>，当赛季结束时将对排位赛成绩进行结算，所有参与排位赛的玩家将根据本赛季所达到的最高段位获得对应的魂石奖励。
2、参与规则：当<color=#d2911e>等级达到6级</color>时，即可开启排位联赛，只有拥有<color=#d2911e>5个及5个以上英雄</color>时，才可参加排位联赛，所有参与排位联赛的选手，系统将会根据大家的实力情况，匹配到合适的队友及对手进行对局。
3、段位规则：排位联赛一共分为<color=#d2911e>7个大段位</color>，分别是：<color=#41e13c>不屈青铜</color>、<color=#e6fff0>闪亮白银</color>、<color=#ffff3c>高贵黄金</color>、<color=#6effc8>光辉铂金</color>、<color=#5f96ff>神圣钻石</color>、<color=#be87ff>永恒王者</color>、<color=#f05050>最强王者</color>，其中前2个大段位均有<color=#d2911e>3</color>个小段位，<color=#ffff3c>高贵黄金</color>和<color=#6effc8>光辉铂金</color>有<color=#d2911e>4</color>个小段位，<color=#5f96ff>神圣钻石</color>和<color=#be87ff>永恒王者</color>有<color=#d2911e>5</color>个小段位。而所有进入<color=#f05050>最强王者</color>的玩家，将会根据星星数量情况进行<color=#d2911e>全服排名</color>。
4、结算奖励：每个赛季结束时，所有参与排位赛的玩家将根据本赛季所达到的最高段位获得对应的魂石奖励。
<color=#f05050>最强王者</color><color=#d2911e>：3000钻</color>
<color=#be87ff>永恒王者</color><color=#d2911e>：2500钻</color>
<color=#5f96ff>神圣钻石</color><color=#d2911e>：2000钻</color>
<color=#6effc8>光辉铂金</color><color=#d2911e>：1500钻</color>
<color=#ffff3c>高贵黄金</color><color=#d2911e>：1000钻</color>
<color=#e6fff0>闪亮白银</color><color=#d2911e>：500钻</color>
<color=#41e13c>不屈青铜</color><color=#d2911e>：300钻</color>
5、关于晋级，降级，晋段，降段：满星状态下触发对应的晋级或者晋段赛，胜利后晋级或者晋段且得到一星；零星状态下触发降级赛或者降段赛，在没有开启段位保护的情况下失败后会降级或者降段。升入最强王者段位后如果在0星且没有开启段位保护的情况下再输一场排位赛会降段到永恒I；白银段位不会掉星。
6、排位赛中不能邀请超过自己2个段位的好友或者战队成员进行组队排位。
7、组队时最强王者段位每50颗星视为一个"大段位"。
8、玩家进入最强王者段位后，系统会每隔7天进行一次检验，如果玩家在7天不进行排位赛，系统将扣除玩家一颗星。
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN:
1. Ranked：Each round is <color=#d2911e> about 3 months</color>, when the season ends the results will be calculated and the top participants in this season will receive diamonds as a reward. 
2. Participation Rules：When<color=#d2911e>a players level is 6 </color> they can unlock League play. Once they have <color=#d2911e> 5 or more Heroes </color> they can begin playing ranked. The system will automatically match opponents based on appropriate teammates and the strength of all. 
3. Rank Rules：Each League is divided into ranks<color=#d2911e> 7 large groups </color>, Including：<color=#41e13c>Bronze</color>, <color=#e6fff0>Silver</color>, <color=#ffff3c>Gold</color>, <color=#6effc8>Platinum</color>, <color=#5f96ff>Diamond</color>, <color=#be87ff>Nobile</color>, <color=#f05050>King</color>, Of the first 2 ranks there are <color=#d2911e>3</color> sub-ranks, for <color=#ffff3c> Gold </color> and <color=#6effc8> Platinum </color> there are <color=#d2911e>4</color>sub-ranks, <color=#5f96ff>Diamond</color> and <color=#be87ff>Nobile</color> have <color=#d2911e>5</color>sub-ranks. Of all the strongest players there is <color=#f05050>King</color> group, which based on stars will part of the <color=#d2911e>All server ranking list</color>。 
4. Participation reward: At the end of each season, all players participating will receive a diamond reward based on their rank. 
<color=#f05050>King</color><color=#d2911e>: 3000 Diamonds</color>
<color=#be87ff>Noble</color><color=#d2911e>： 2500 Diamonds</color>
<color=#5f96ff>Diamond</color><color=#d2911e>：2000 Diamonds</color>
<color=#6effc8>Platinum</color><color=#d2911e>：1500 Diamonds</color>
<color=#ffff3c>Gold</color><color=#d2911e>：1000 Diamonds</color>
<color=#e6fff0>Silver</color><color=#d2911e>：500 Diamonds</color>
<color=#41e13c>Bronze</color><color=#d2911e>：300 Diamonds</color>
5, Regarding Promotions and demotions: Full stars will result in a promotion match, after winning will be moved to next rank with 1 star. If reduced to no stars then will have a demotion match, if no demotion protection is enable and a loss occurs then will be demoted. If you are King Rank and you are reduced to 0 stars, in addition did not enable demotion protection, then lose another match, you will be placed in Nobile I. Silver Rank will not lose stars. 
6. While in ranked seasons are running you cannot add more than 2 ranked new friends or team members to ranked team. 
7. When creating a team King rank every 50 stars can be considered “High Rank”. 
8. For players in King, the system will check every 7 days. For those players who have not participated in a ranked match the last 7 days, their stars will be deduct by 1.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN:
1、<color=#d2911e>获胜一方加一颗星，战败一方减一颗星的基础加减星规则不变。对战积分是新增的另一种加星的规则。</color>
2、在比赛结束后，无论胜负都会得到对战积分，对战积分=<color=#d2911e>玩家无挂机行为奖励+连胜奖励+局内评分奖励</color>。如果出现挂机行为，一律不能获得对战积分。
3、当对战积分达到一定的上限时，系统会自动消耗当前的对战积分为玩家增加一颗星，积分的上限根据玩家的段位递增。
4、段位保护机制：<color=#d2911e>当玩家处于0星的情况下输掉比赛，如果玩家赛前的对战积分大于等于所在段位保级要求的对战积分时，系统会扣除掉玩家所有的对战积分同时让玩家保级，如未达则会降入下个等级。</color>
5、2V2玩家无挂机行为奖励：3分
6、2V2局内评分排名奖励：第1名：6分 第2名：4分 第3名：2分
7、2V2连胜奖励：
2连胜：2分
3连胜：4分
4连胜：5分
5连胜及以上：7分
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN:
1. <color=#d2911e>The winning team will add a star, and the defeated team will lose a star, these rules will not change. The points system is another way to add a star. </color>
2. Battle points are earned after each match no matter you win or lose. Points earned are the sum of <color=#d2911e>non-idle bonus, win streak bonus, and game rating bonus.</color> If player idles, they will not receive these points. 
3. Once the points reach their limit they will be removed and the player will be given a star. The amount of points required depends on the players current status. 
4. Demotion Protection:<color=#d2911e> When a player loses a game with 0 stars, if their points before the match is equal to or great their Rank protection required points, then the system will remove all points and keep current rank. If player does not have enough points then they will be demoted. </color>
5. 2v2 No idling reward: 3 Points
6. 2v2 Score Reward: 1st place - 6 points, 2nd place - 4 points, 3rd place - 2 points. 
7. 2v2 Winning Streak rewards:
2 Wins：2 points
3 Wins：4 points
4 Wins：5 points
5 Wins or greater：7 points

ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: This race has not yet been released.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 虽然一度被视为弱小的种族，但是经历过无数的纷争和磨难后，人族依然屹立不倒。智慧和顽强的意志力让他们成为一个坚毅的种族。
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Although regarded as a weak race, after countless strife and disputes the Human race still stands today. Wisdom and a stubborn will make them a strong race.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 人族用他们的智慧和团结弥补了肉体上的弱点，均衡的部队让他们能稳定的面对任何情况。
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: The humans used their wisdom and time in isolation to protect against their physical weakness. It allowed them to balance the forces and build stability.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 鲜血与荣耀，对兽人来说，战争是解决问题的最好方式，如今的兽族已经重新唤醒了内心的兽性。他们用狂野的力量向世界宣告了征服者的来临。
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Talent is automatically upgraded with levels 1/4/8.Blood and Glory! For Orcs, war is the best way to move ahead. Today’s Orcs have reawakened their inner beasts and love a good fight. They use their wild power in hopes of conquering the world.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 兽族是荒蛮与力量的代表，在正面冲撞中，高攻高血量的兽族地面部队几乎无可匹敌。
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: The Orcs are the essence of wild strength. In a frontal attack their high attack and large health are almost unmatched.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 他们是恐惧和死亡的实体，永恒的诅咒让亡灵们被困在生与死的夹缝中受尽折磨。现在，他们的痛苦开始不断在整个大陆蔓延。
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: They are the entities of fear and death. The eternal curse keeps them undead, trapped between life and death. Now they wish to spread the pain throughout the continent.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 瘟疫、死灵、诅咒，战斗越是旷日持久，亡灵的部队就能发挥越为恐怖的战斗力。
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Plague, death spirit, and curses. The longer a battle lasts the more powerful they become.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 精灵的力量跟他们赖以生存的自然息息相关，每当自然的秩序遭到破坏，精灵的部队一定会挺身而出。
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: The power of the Elves is closely related to nature. Those whom imbalance nature feel the force of the Elves.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 精灵们受到了月神的赐福，到了晚上精灵的部队会焕发更强大的战斗力。
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: The elves were blessed by the moon goddess and in the night they become even more powerful.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 您的当前对战信用低于90分，禁止参加排位赛！请保持良好的游戏行为恢复对战信用。
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Your rep is less than 90, therefore you are unable to join the ranked game. You can restore your rep by having good in game behavior.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 您的当前对战信用低于60分，禁止参加多人匹配对战！请保持良好的游戏行为恢复对战信用。
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Your rep is less than 60 therefore you are unable to play in multiplayer matches. You can restore your rep by having good in game behavior.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN:
1、可重复体验关卡（不会再获得奖励）
2、第一关：开端，可学习基础操作：<color=#d1b17b>移动</color>，<color=#d1b17b>攻击</color>，<color=#d1b17b>集火</color>，<color=#d1b17b>跟随</color>
3、第二关：追击，可学习<color=#d1b17b>训练士兵</color>
4、第三关：守卫金矿，可学习<color=#d1b17b>建造金矿</color>，<color=#d1b17b>建造防御塔</color>
5、第四关：大决战，可学习<color=#d1b17b>侦查</color>，<color=#d1b17b>圣甲虫</color>，<color=#d1b17b>沙漠之王</color>，<color=#d1b17b>装备</color>
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN:
1. You can repeat the training more than once (but cannot claim reward more than once).
2. First: Start by learning the basic operations: <color=#d1b17b>Movement</color>, <color=#d1b17b> Attack</color>, <color=#d1b17b> Targeting</color>, <color=#d1b17b>Follow</color>
3, Second the chase which includes <color=#d1b17b>Training Soldiers </color>
3. Third: Guarding Mines, including <color=#d1b17b>Building Mines</color>, <color=#d1b17b> Building defensive towers</color>
5. Fourth, Big Battles including, <color=#d1b17b>Sight</color>, <color=#d1b17b>The Holy Scarab</color>, <color=#d1b17b> The Desert King</color>, and <color=#d1b17b>Gear</color>

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN:
1、初始的领主等级为：<color=#FFEB04FF>见习领主</color>
2、领主等级分为：<color=#FFEB04FF>见习领主</color>，<color=#FFEB04FF>初级领主</color>，<color=#FFEB04FF>中级领主</color>，<color=#FFEB04FF>高级领主</color>4个阶段；<color=#ffa500ff>不同的领主等级可出战的兵种不同</color>（可通过匹配界面查看可出战兵种信息），<color=#ffa500ff>高级领主</color>可使用所有种族与兵种
3、每局对战结束(无论输赢)都可增加领主等级经验，可获得领主等级经验的对战模式如下：<color=#ffa500ff>2v2匹配</color>,<color=#ffa500ff>1v1匹配</color>
4、组队对战时，当次战斗可使用种族与兵种为<color=#ffa500ff>队伍中最低的领主等级</color>的可出战兵种
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN:
1. Starting title：<color=#FFEB04FF> Rookie </color>
2. Titles include：<color=#FFEB04FF>Rookie</color>, <color=#FFEB04FF> Lord</color>, <color=#FFEB04FF> Elite</color>, <color=#FFEB04FF> Master</color>, <color=#FFEB04FF> Epic</color> altogether 5;<color=#ffa500ff> Different titles can use different troops</color>(You can check this on the matchmaking page). <color=#ffa500ff>Epic Title </color> can use all troop types.
3. At the end of each match, regardless of winning or losing you can gain title Exp. Modes include:<color=#ffa500ff> 2v2 Quick Play</color>, <color=#ffa500ff> 1v1 Quick Play</color>
4. In team battles you are limited to use the races and troops available for<color=#ffa500ff> the lowest-title player</color>.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN:
大盗斯诺德偷走了时空之神的手杖，莫格兰大陆的时间彻底失控，一切都变得……飞快无比！

金币获取速度 +500%
建造速度 +500%
野怪刷新速度 +300%
移动速度 +100%
冷却缩减 +70%

魔力飞舞、火花四溅，暴走的莫格兰大陆，等你来战
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN:
Since Snod stole the Staff of Time, things have progressed very fast, and Atheria has gone out of control. 

金币获取速度 +500%
建造速度 +500%
野怪刷新速度 +300%
移动速度 +100%
冷却缩减 +70%

魔力飞舞、火花四溅, 暴走的莫格兰大陆, 等你来战

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN:
沉睡在莫格兰大陆深处的创世神柱遭到了邪魔的入侵，英雄们暂时搁置了争端，共同守卫大陆的存亡。

英雄们需要抵御来自异界邪魔的30波攻势
不断出现的boss，需要英雄们团结协作才能战胜
英雄等级最高可到30级，并可解锁专属技能
全新装备系统，英雄专属，传说套装，祝您完成超神之旅

英雄们，创世神柱正在发出召唤，你会加入吗？
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN:
Deep within the depths of Atheria, demons invaded a place of the gods. Heroes put aside their disputes to guard the mainland. 

 Heroes need to defend against a 30 wave offensive from the demons. 
 Heroes must work together to beat them and the many Boss’s that will appear. 
 Heroes up to level 30 can unlock skills
 New Gear System, Hero Attributes, Legendary Clothing, we wish you the best of luck

 Hero will you take on this challenge?

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 战旗室最多存放500个战旗，请前往分解
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: 战旗室最多存放500个战旗，请前往分解

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 在<color=#F4CB64FF>匹配</color>和<color=#F4CB64FF>排位</color>对战中不死击杀<color=#F4CB64FF>5</color>个英雄及以上可增加<color=#F4CB64FF>王者再临</color>点数
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: 在<color=#F4CB64FF>匹配</color>和<color=#F4CB64FF>排位</color>对战中不死击杀<color=#F4CB64FF>5</color>个英雄及以上可增加<color=#F4CB64FF>王者再临</color>点数

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: <color=#F4CB64FF>在匹配</color>和<color=#F4CB64FF>排位</color>对战中连续击杀<color=#F4CB64FF>13</color>个小兵或以上可增加<color=#F4CB64FF>天下无双</color>点数
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: <color=#F4CB64FF>在匹配</color>和<color=#F4CB64FF>排位</color>对战中连续击杀<color=#F4CB64FF>13</color>个小兵或以上可增加<color=#F4CB64FF>天下无双</color>点数

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：合理的打野路线可以快速获得经验及金钱
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: Taking a good route through wilds can give you more experience and money.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：获得的属性书越多，英雄的能力越强
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: The more Attributes you get, the stronger your heroes power.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：小地图上不同颜色的野怪点代表不同等级的野怪
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: Pay attention to the colors on the map as the represent different levels of wild monsters.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：升级攻击与防御可以提升部队战斗力
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: Upgrading attack and defense can improve the effectiveness of your team.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：副基地没打掉之前主基地无法被攻击
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: You must destroy the secondary base before attacking the main base.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：点击建造中的单位头像可以取消建造
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: You can cancel construction by clicking on the small unit avatar.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：在泉水中点击部队头像可以解散该单位
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: You can dismiss troops in center of your base by clicking their icon.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：合理的部队搭配可以形成强悍的战斗力
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: A good combination of troops can be very powerful.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：魔法单位的技能效果强，但是普通攻击力低
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: Magic skill is strong, but attack power is low.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：魔免单位对魔法攻击及效果免疫
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: Magic Immune will block magic attacks.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：人口上限超过20后会进入高维修费状态，获取黄金的速度降低
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: Once your troop cap reached more than 20 there will be a high maintenance cost and speed of Gold produced will be slowed.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：合理的使用召唤师技能可以获得奇效
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: 提示：合理的使用召唤师技能可以获得奇效

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：使用集火按钮可以命令所有单位攻击同一个目标
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: Use target button to command all troops to attack target.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：撤退时使用跟随按钮可以更快速的让部队从战场撤走
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: Use the follow button to have troops retreat more quickly.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：在建造分矿时，记得建造防御塔来守卫您的分矿
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: When building a mine, remember to build defensive towers to protect it.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：留心每一个草丛，被敌人成功埋伏会让你损失惨重
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: Beware of the tall grass as enemies can ambush you from it.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：在防御建筑菜单下可以使用免费的侦查守卫
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: Free scouts can be used under defensive building menu.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：英雄死亡时，您仍然可以操作剩余的部队继续战斗
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: When your Hero dies you can still control your troops.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：装备的等级由低到高分为绿、蓝、紫、橙四级
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: The level of Gear is divided from low to high: Green, Blue, Purple, and Orange.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：当周围有敌方的隐身单位时，您的英雄身上会出现提示
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Tip: Your Hero will be prompted when there are invisible Heroes around.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 提示：在晚上，精灵族的移动速度会增加
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: 提示：在晚上，精灵族的移动速度会增加

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 您可以<color=#FFF800FF>拖动摇杆</color>来控制您英雄的<color=#FFF800FF>移动</color>。
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: You can <color=#FFF800FF>drag the joystick </color>to control your Heroes <color=#FFF800FF>movements</color>。

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 使用<color=#FFF800FF>集火</color>可以让您的部队击中<color=#FFF800FF>攻击</color>当前<color=#FFF800FF>选中</color>的<color=#FFF800FF>目标</color>
<color=#FFF800FF>跟随</color>按钮可以让您的部队停止当前的行为，并<color=#FFF800FF>跟随</color>您的<color=#FFF800FF>英雄移动</color>
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: <color=#FFF800FF>Follow button </color> will stop troop attacks, and <color=#FFF800FF>will follow </color>your <color=#FFF800FF>Hero</color>

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 您可以在科技界面训练士兵或升级科技
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: You can train troop or upgrade tech on the tech screen.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 士兵的训练进度可以在左上角的小兵头像处查看
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: The troops training progress can be seen on the top left corner under troop avatar.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 您可以在左上角的信息栏查看您当前部队的人口信息
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: You can view your troop cap status in the upper left hand corner of your screen.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 点击建造金矿，金矿能为您带来额外的金币收入
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Removing monsters from the yellow dots on the map and build a mine to get even more Gold.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 您当前的金币数量将显示在左上角的信息栏
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Your current amount of gold will be displayed in the upper left hand corner of your screen.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 点击展开防御塔建造界面
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Click to expand the defense tower build options.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 在受损的建筑附近，您可以点击维修按钮来维修建筑
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: When near a damaged building you can click the repair button to repair them.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 击杀野怪会有概率掉落装备，移动到装备位置即可点击右侧拾取栏来拾取装备
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Wild monsters have a chance to drop gear. Move near the equipment and click on the item on the right to pick them up.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 移动到统帅之刃的光圈内即可开始拾取统帅之刃，拾取进度条走完时，即可成功拾取统帅之刃
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Move toward the Blade of Commandment and click on it to pick it up. Once the progress bar is complete you will have it to use.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 剧情模式不支持修改此设置哦~
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: Switching to default does not change this setting.

ResSystemLanguageDesc.SCN: 战争怒吼，公平竞技掌控全局！
ResSystemLanguageDesc.EN: 战争怒吼，公平竞技掌控全局！
